name: My Golem Friend
description:
My Golem Friend is a short, sweet, low-poly adventure that features a unique crafting system and a golem that you help... grow? Explore a moderately sized map retrieving ingredients and unlocking recipes to take back to your home where you'll mix them together to create components for your Golem!

 This game was developed over a week during a summer game jam.  Wyatt is a junior game developer who wrote all of the code, produced the UI content, and designed the game. His partner, Kelly, produced all the 3D assets and designed the map layout.

All assets are the intellectual property of Wyatt & Kelly, do not redistribute.
